tag_list: search-congress, events, seo, sem, smm, ouali, webcongress, spain, benmeziane
overview:
hyperactive networker, excellent public relation skills, strong internet marketing competences. Ouali is a young dinamic creative person that know cashing oportunities and offering to others. In less than 1 year in Spain, Ouali becomes part of the major actors in the Internet Scene, getting oficial partnership with biggest companies likes Google, yahoo, Microsoft, Softonic.

Ouali is also the SEO Godfather of one of the biggest Spanish newspaper: Lavanguardia.es, “Consejero Editorial” is offering his knowledge to make better the lavanguardia’s websites and content, and managing the Search Forum responding questions. Also right with frequency some article about internet business.

Ouali founded SearchCongress, biggest search engines event in Spain, getting sponsorship of majors actors and brands, international attendees and speakers, exceptional media covering: tv, radio, newspaper, blog and web2.0
